text: "Poorhouse Rock" is the 22nd episode of The Simpsons 33rd season. It was first broadcast on the Fox network on May 22, 2022. It is the last episode of the season. In the episode, Bart Simpson wants to have a job like his father Homer, who works as security at a power plant. However, a janitor from Homer's job shows him that the way his parents used to make money is not possible anymore. The episode guest stars Hugh Jackman as the janitor. The episode was watched by about 930,000 people when it was first broadcast. == References == == Other websites == * Category:2020s television episodes Category:The Simpsons episodes
title: Poorhouse Rock
